thread.title: Mrs A Baldwin
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs A Baldwin

author: Mrs A Baldwin
title: Mrs A Baldwin
text: We decided to pay the extra expense and go for these blinds...so pleased we did! All we had to do was measure the windows to the nearest 'mm' and input all the measurements and both blinds were delivered within the week with regular updates as to progress being made. They were so easy to fit. We opted for the Deluxe perfect raise headrail with chain sidewinder and it is SO smooth, we are very impressed! Would definitely order more products from this company.
